item.title: The Rose Is On The Bloom
item.description:
Bloom Energy recently introduced its “Energy Server” fuel cell, presenting it as a significant step towards greener energy and energy independence. This begs the question: how impactful will this new technology actually be? While it’s early to definitively say, Bloom Energy’s generators could become a vital part of energy production and management, or even revolutionize our relationship with energy entirely. The Bloom Energy Server originated from a NASA project aimed at generating air and fuel from electricity for Mars expeditions...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-rose-is-on-the-bloom/
